Class Spacer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region

            • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.Spacer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Spacer
extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
    Handy little spacer class to keep things in GUI appart.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spacer

        public Spacer()
        Constructor for symmetrical standard spacing.

      • Spacer

        public Spacer(double dSize)
        Constructor for symmetrical spacing.
        Parameters:
        dSize - A double containing the horizontal and vertical spacing.

      • Spacer

        public Spacer(double dWidth,
              double dHeight)
        Constructor for asymmetrical spacing.
        Parameters:
        dWidth - A double containing the horizontal spacing.
        dHeight - A double containing the vertical spacing.

      • Spacer

        public Spacer(javafx.geometry.Orientation orientation)
        Constructor for spring spacing. Either horizontal or vertical. It takes up all the remaining space that is available in the selected orientation.
        Parameters:
        orientation - An Orientation enumeration type.
